trans-unit.source: Specifies the rows or columns that are resized by a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Specifica le righe o colonne che vengono ridimensionate da un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.
trans-unit.target: Questa enumerazione viene utilizzata per impostare il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>proprietà di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: Space is redistributed based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment*> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment*> properties.
trans-unit.target: Lo spazio viene ridistribuito in base al valore del <> </> *> e <> </> *> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> property specifies that space is redistributed between rows, the redistribution follows these guidelines: - When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Top>, space is redistributed between the row that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> and the row that is above that row.
trans-unit.target: Se il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>proprietà specifica che lo spazio viene ridistribuito tra righe, la ridistribuzione segue queste linee guida:: se il <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Top>, lo spazio viene ridistribuito tra la riga specificata per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>e la riga di sopra della riga.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Top> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: - When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Bottom>, space is redistributed between the row that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> and the row that is below that row.
trans-unit.target: -Quando il <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Bottom>, lo spazio viene ridistribuito tra la riga specificata per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>e la riga che si trova sotto tale riga.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Bottom> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: - When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Center>, space is redistributed between the row that is above and the row that is below the row that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.
trans-unit.target: -Quando la <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>proprietà è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Center>, lo spazio viene ridistribuito tra la riga che è di sopra e la riga che si trova sotto la riga specificata per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Center> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: - When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch>, space is redistributed between the row that is above and the row that is below the row that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.
trans-unit.target: -Quando la <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>proprietà è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch>, lo spazio viene ridistribuito tra la riga che è di sopra e la riga che si trova sotto la riga specificata per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> property specifies that space is redistributed between columns, the redistribution follows these guidelines: - When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Left>, space is redistributed between the column that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> and the column that is to the left.
trans-unit.target: Se il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>proprietà specifica che lo spazio viene ridistribuito tra colonne e la ridistribuzione segue queste linee guida:: se il <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Left>, lo spazio viene ridistribuito tra la colonna specificata per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>e la colonna a sinistra.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Left> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: - When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Right>, space is redistributed between the column that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> and the column that is to the right.
trans-unit.target: -Quando il <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Right>, lo spazio viene ridistribuito tra la colonna specificata per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>e la colonna a destra.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Right> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: - When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Center>, space is redistributed between the columns that are to the left and right of the column that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.
trans-unit.target: -Quando la <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>proprietà è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Center>, lo spazio viene ridistribuito tra le colonne che sono a sinistra e a destra della colonna specificata per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Center> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: - When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch>, space is redistributed between the columns that are to the left and right of the column that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.
trans-unit.target: -Quando la <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>proprietà è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch>, lo spazio viene ridistribuito tra le colonne che sono a sinistra e a destra della colonna specificata per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>, space is redistributed between the row that is specified for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> and the next row that is below it.
trans-unit.target: Per un oggetto orizzontale <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>, lo spazio viene ridistribuito tra la riga specificata per il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> e la riga successiva di sotto di essa.

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>, space is redistributed between the column that is specified for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> and the next column that is to the right.
trans-unit.target: Per un oggetto verticale <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>, lo spazio viene ridistribuito tra la colonna specificata per il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> e quella immediatamente a destra.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>, space is redistributed between the row that is specified for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> and the next row that is above it.
trans-unit.target: Per un oggetto orizzontale <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>, lo spazio viene ridistribuito tra la riga specificata per il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> e la riga successiva di sopra di esso.

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>, space is redistributed between the column that is specified for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> and the next column that is to the left.
trans-unit.target: Per un oggetto verticale <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>, lo spazio viene ridistribuito tra la colonna specificata per il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> e quella immediatamente a sinistra.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>, space is redistributed between the rows that are above and below the row that is specified for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Per un oggetto orizzontale <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>, lo spazio viene ridistribuito tra le righe che sono di sopra e sotto la riga specificata per il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>, space is redistributed between the columns that are to the left and right of the column that is specified for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Per un oggetto verticale <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>, lo spazio viene ridistribuito tra le colonne che si trovano a sinistra e destra della colonna specificata per il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.
